title: Light-steerable locomotion using zero-elastic-energy modes
summary:
Nature Materials, Published online: 04 October 2024; doi:10.1038/s41563-024-02026-4

Zero-elastic-energy modes drive the self-sustained locomotion of a liquid crystal elastomer torus across various environments.
